eventDescription: User selected an AI model for evaluation - conversion event for starting evaluation flow
User deselected an AI model - helps understand model preference patterns
User started an evaluation session by sending a prompt to models - key conversion event
Evaluation finished with all model responses - measures successful evaluation completions
User triggered joke generation in joke mode - key conversion for humor feature
User rated a joke as funny or not funny - critical engagement metric
User clicked to swap to a random different model - engagement metric
User exported evaluation results - conversion event showing high value engagement
User voted on a joke in the joke wall - community engagement metric
User commented on a joke - high engagement conversion event
User changed global settings like system prompt or temperature - power user engagement
User navigated between different views (models, evaluation, joke, funny_index) - navigation tracking
